title: List of islands of Cambodia
text:
The following is a list of <a href="Cambodia">Cambodia</a>'s <a href="island">island</a>s, all situated in the <a href="Gulf%20of%20Thailand">Gulf of Thailand</a> (, Chhoung Samut Siem). All islands are, apart from the group of the outer islands, in relative proximity to the coast and can easily and quickly be reached. The north-westernmost islands near and around the <a href="Koh%20Kong%20%28city%29">Koh Kong</a> river (Khmer: Prek Kaoh Pao) delta area are to a great extent engulfed in contiguous <a href="mangrove">mangrove</a> marshes and consequently hard to recognize.
Almost all islands have more than one name and there are islands sharing names (e.g. 2 x Koh Moul, 2 x Koh Domloung). Ancient Malay and <a href="French%20protectorate%20of%20Cambodia">French colonial</a> names are still being used and/or have merged with Khmer names. Individual and unstandardized <a href="Romanization%20of%20Khmer">Romanization of Khmer</a> writing has resulted in multiple spelling variants of the island's names. Sources, such as <a href="Geonames">Geonames</a> offer several variants. Tables below follow the geography from north-west to south-east.
